title: Rear Ash Removal System
description: Design and implement rear-access ash removal system for masonry firebox. Key features: angled grate at rear of hearth (slopes upward to back wall), wide shallow trough beneath, removable/covered tray accessible from wood storage room. Must integrate with secondary combustion chamber and hydronic heat exchanger placement. Multi-session design effort requiring detailed technical drawings.
